description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Crab & Lemon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Crab & Lemon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion (cut into quarters, then finely sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the onion and a pinch of salt, and cook over a low heat for 5 minutes, or until soft and translucent. Stir in the garlic and lemon zest and cook for a few seconds more.
Stir through the parsley and crabmeat, then season well with salt and lots of black pepper. Add lemon juice to taste.

Meanwhile, cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water for 6-8 minutes, or until it is cooked but still has a bit of bite to it. Drain, keeping back a tiny amount of the cooking water. Return the pasta to the pan and toss together. Add the crab sauce, toss again, drizzle with chilli oil (if using), and serve.
